english: I love spending time with my family.

arabic: عائلتي هي كل شيء بالنسبة لي.

english: We have a very close-knit family.
We have a big family gathering every year.
I miss my family so much.
Family is the most important thing in life.
arabic: العائلة هي أهم شيء في الحياة.

english: We have a lot in common with my family.
arabic: لدينا الكثير من القواسم المشتركة مع عائلتي.

english: My family always makes me laugh.
I'm so lucky to have such a great family.
arabic: أنا محظوظ جدًا لوجود مثل هذه العائلة الرائعة.

english: We have a strong family bond.
My family is my safe place.
I always feel loved and supported by my family.
arabic: أشعر دائمًا بالحب والدعم من عائلتي.
